profile:
Toronto Tree Removal is fully operational during the Covid 19 pandemic. Tree work is socially isolated by its nature and we have taken further steps to keep everyone safe. Tree workers travel to and from sites in their own vehicles. Vehicles and equipment are wiped down regularly. The outdoor work environment is not conducive to transmission.
Wait times are shorter - call for a quote today.

Ever had that nervous feeling when you're shopping for expert services and you aren't sure who to trust? 
We've had it when our car needs service or when our furnace breaks down. But how about your tree work?

Nine years ago, I started a tree company that set out to provide customers with enough information that they can make an informed decision plus the technical know-how to get the work done safely and efficiently. 
So far we've succeeded. 

Request a quote and see what I mean. 

- Aaron Hill

President, Toronto Tree Removal Inc.
service_area: Toronto, North York, Mississauga, Oakville, Scarborough, Markham, Richmond Hill, Thornhill,Vaughan, Etobicoke,
specialities: We remove trees from tiny saplings to the largest trees in the GTA. We have an excellent record for safety, technical know-how and efficient work. There is literally no job too difficult for us to carry out. Request a quote and we'll be glad to stop by and assess your needs.

profile:
Glenwood Tree Service Inc has great customer service. Skilled experienced professionals. Friendly approachable crew. Performance you can trust.
 
We want to take good care of you and your trees. When our work is done, we want you to be happy.
 
That has been the primary goal of Steve Lukac, Glenwood’s owner, since he ventured into tree care over 25  years ago.
 
In the early years, as a proprietor, Steve was sales manager, crew leader, climber and administrator. He incorporated Glenwood Tree Service Inc. in May 2001. 
 
From humble beginnings with just one truck and chipper, Glenwood can now serve you with a fleet of trucks which include 3 bucket trucks, a crane truck, 2 log trucks, 3 chipper trucks as well as 6 chippers and 2 stumpers. 
 
Steve’s aim to build a company that would be recognized as reputable, credible and professional has been realized.
 
75% of our jobs come from existing customers and their referrals.
 
We’d love to have you as our satisfied customer too.

profile:
Maintaining the vitality of your trees is our mission, doing it with Safety, Integrity and Professionalism is our promise.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Serving: Burlington, Oakville, Hamilton, Grimsby, St Catharines, Ancaster, Stoney Creek, Dundas, Waterdown, Niagara, Niagara-On-The-Lake, Dunnville, Caledonia, Cayuga and West Lincoln.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

At Arborwood Tree Service we are dedicated to providing superior customer service. Our great reputation is built on professionalism and customer satisfaction.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Your trees are living resources and our ISA Certified Arborists will help you steward your property to ensure beautiful, healthy trees and shrubs, both now, and for the future. Our team has the knowledge and expertise that's needed to help you achieve this, and we offer a full range of services to get the job done.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Services Include:  Certified Arborists, Tree Pruning, Tree Consultation, Tree Preservation, Tree Fertilization, Air Spading for Root Collar Excavations, Support Systems for Trees, Tree Removal, Stump Removal, Emergency Tree Services, Complete Tree Care, Arborist Reports, Tree Spraying, Arborganix, Emerald Ash Borer Treatments and Insect and Disease control for Trees.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Preserve Trees & Improve Life....
The preservation of trees improves not only our quality of life, but also the lives of generations to come. When you stop to appreciate a vibrant healthy tree, full of life and energy, your spirit is rejuvenated. Trees not only beautify our surroundings, they clean the air and minimize the need for storm water retention, through transpiration in relation to their leaf surface. Trees provide homes and food for wild life, and are a major contribution to our environment. They also provide shade, noise reduction, shelter, and help increase significant energy savings by protecting our homes from the suns heat.

profile:
YOUR LOCAL PROFESSIONAL TREE SERVICE
Keeping Canopies Green and Properties Safe

ABOUT US
Borer’s Falls Tree Service is a locally owned and operated company serving Ancaster, Ontario and the surrounding areas. 
Our top priority is providing our clients the best customer service you could ask for. 
Our team of experts and tree care professionals use the most up to date and safe tree work practices to ensure your job is done right.

We Care About the Details
Our company pays special attention to the details of every project to ensure the complete satisfaction of each customer. 
Our goal is to leave each job neat and clean as if we were never there.

Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed
Your satisfaction is our priority and we strive to provide a service we are proud of.  
We start every project by providing a thorough consultation to understand your goals and the needs of the job, while also contributing a wealth of knowledge in the urban forestry industry. 
We do this to guarantee that the project is completed according to your preferences while keeping in mind tree and plant health.

Get a Free Estimate - 289 880 0047

profile:
With over 5 years of experience in forestry and tree removal, we are proud to serve southern Ontario and surrounding areas for all your tree care needs, no matter how big or small.
 
Pruning - Often, trees are pruned for building, pedestrian, sidewalk, and utility wire clearance. Other times they are pruned for in order to improve the structure of the tree and reduce the risk of future failures. When pruned properly, trees will maintenance free for several years. Topping is not an advisable form of pruning as they will cause damage and hinder future growth and possibly create a hazardous tree later on, also increasing the cost of future maintenance.

Removal - When ​trees are diseased, badly damaged or otherwise in decline they can pose a safety hazard to your family and surrounding neighbours, structures, fences and other landscape features. We can help you make an informed decision on whether or not to retain or remove a tree.
 
Cabling - Cabling is a form of preventative maintenance for trees to help add strength to flaws in the structure and reduce the risk of future failures during severe weather. We can help you decide which method of cabling is suitable for your trees.
 
Tree Planting - Spring and summer is the best time to plant trees. Especially during cooler spring months that offer plenty of rain. Careful consideration of placement and which species of tree are areas that we would love to help you with. Young, newly transplanted trees should get lots of water at regular intervals.
 
Stump ​Grinding - ​Removal of old and new stumps for future landscaping is recommended. Especially for new sod and plant bed installations.
services: Pruning - Removal - Cabling - Tree Planting - Stump Grinding
